overview: “Rio de Janeiro: Brazil!” takes the viewer on a visual journey to one of the most beautiful and vibrant cities in the world. Experience the main stage of the Football Worldcup 2014 and the Summer Olympics in 2016 like you have never seen it before! As part of the fifth largest country in the world, Brazil, Rio is the third largest metropolitan area of South America with 12 million inhabitants. Surrounded by the Atlantic Ocean, mountains with large rainforests and constant influence of a tropic climate the city is one of the most exotic urban places on earth.
title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil!
